import React from 'react'; import css from 'components/counter/common.css' export const Statistics = ({title ='Statistics', good, bad, neutral, total, positivePercentage }) => { return (

{title}

Good: {good}

Neutral: {neutral}

Bad: {bad}

Total: {total}

Positive feedback: {positivePercentage}%

{/* {(bad || good || neutral) ? ( ) : (

No feedback

)} */}
) }
